item.title: Django personal tips
item.description: This article is the last day of [Django Advent Calendar 2019](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/django). #Introduction Nice to meet you. Thank you. I usually develop web applications using Djnago. -Sill Trend This year’s Django Advent Calendar 2019 was also enjoyed every day. All the articles were interesting and informative. So, in this article, the last day of the calendar, I’d like to organize some basic and personal tips for Django. We hope that this article can help make Django even more popular.
